content: जयः [जि भावे अच्] {@--1@} Conquest, triumph, victory, success, winning (in battle, game or a law-suit). {@--2@} Restraint, curbing, conquest as in इंद्रियजय. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the sun. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Jayanta, son of Indra. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Yudhiṣṭhira, the first Pāṇḍava prince. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of an attendant of Viṣṇu. {@--7@} An epithet of Arjuna. --या {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of an attendant of the goddess Durgā. {@--3@} A kind of banner. {@--4@} The third, eighth or thirteenth lunar days of any of the two lunar fortnights.
